entity.name: Sobek - Crocodile God
entity.subtitle: God of the Nile, Crocodiles, and Fertility
entity.description: Sobek is the crocodile god of the Nile, military prowess, and fertility. Fierce protector and symbol of pharaonic power. Associated with both creation (emerged from primordial waters) and danger (crocodiles in the Nile). Sometimes considered son of Neith. Crocodiles were kept in sacred pools at his temples.
